column4: I cannot seem to find the answer to my problem on the community forums, i am sure it is an easy fix and common problem. I have just install ubuntu (dual-boot) with windows 7 previously existing. Grub does not launch i do not have an OS selector, just defaults to windows 7
sounds like you should reinstall grub.
i am currently running on the live disc, and have gone into the package manager removed and added grub. Grub consantly fails install "Grub has failed to install on device /dev/sda"
First mount the partition that has boot on it. Can you do that?
